name: Weirder Stuff
description:
Move Emme with WASD. Utilize your telekinesis by hitting SPACEBAR to protect yourself from the Displacer Beasts which inhabit your tormented subconscious. Destroy them and their spawn to free your mind. Collect nutritious waffles to increase your score.

Weirder Stuff

Artwork & Character Design: Tom Caprel

Game Design. Programming, & Writing: Ross A. Hersemann

Programming & Sound: Ali Cedroni
